body_html:
One possible solution:

Do not concat the classification result and store it in the Variable pos1. This may prevent PyTorch from releasing memory. Instead, extract data from pos1 and store it in a Python list.
body_text:
One possible solution:
Do not concat the classification result and store it in the Variable pos1. This may prevent PyTorch from releasing memory. Instead, extract data from pos1 and store it in a Python list.
body:
One possible solution:

Do not concat the classification result and store it in the `Variable` `pos1`. This may prevent PyTorch from releasing memory. Instead, extract data from `pos1` and store it in a Python list.
